item.title: RFK Jr. wants more people wearing health wearables in the name of ‘MAHA’
item.description: Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is making health wearables a major part of his preventive health agenda.

item.title: Trump’s Big Beautiful Bill will accelerate an American energy crisis—and it could cost the U.S. the AI race
item.description: The megabill just passed by Congress handicaps clean energy when the U.S. needs more power more quickly.

item.title: The next phase of Starbucks’ turnaround plan is offering executives up to $6 million in stock grants, as baristas scrap to get annual raises above 2%
item.description: Baristas reportedly received 2% to 3% pay increases at the end of 2024 following a tough financial year. New CEO Brian Niccol received nearly $100 mil...

item.title: Stocks hit another record as House sends Trump $4.5 trillion bill to kick off July 4 weekend
item.description: The S&P 500 hit another record after data showed strong hiring.
